decks.notes: The deck focuses on quickly building a wide board presence and dealing direct damage to the opponent. It includes cards that buff and pump up creatures to hit hard and fast. The key strategy involves playing aggressively to overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize. The deck aims to control the battlefield by using efficient creatures with haste and burn spells to finish off the opponent quickly. It prioritizes tempo and pressure to force the opponent to react to its threats, ultimately leading to a swift victory.

This deck focuses on putting pressure on the opponent quickly with aggressive creatures and burn spells. The goal is to establish a strong board presence early on with cards like Knight-Errant of Eos and Imodane's Recruiter, while also disrupting the opponent's strategy with cards like Novice Inspector. Resolute Reinforcements and Sanguine Evangelist provide additional support for the aggro plan, aiming to overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize. The deck's mana base includes lands that provide colored mana and help ensure a smooth curve of plays.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive Boros creatures and efficient removal spells. By playing low-cost cards like Novice Inspector and Yotian Frontliner, backed up by powerful spells like Resolute Reinforcements and Knight-Errant of Eos, this deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early and maintain a strong board presence. The inclusion of cards like Mirrex and Get Lost provide additional ways to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. This deck is designed to quickly close out games by attacking relentlessly and maintaining board dominance.

The main focus of this Boros Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy. The deck includes a mix of efficient creatures like Knight-Errant of Eos and Novice Inspector, alongside powerful spells like Resolute Reinforcements and Destroy Evil to maintain board control. The inclusion of cards like Cavern of Souls and Warleader's Call also helps to ensure that your creatures can't be countered, allowing for your aggro strategy to be successful. The key concept is to attack quickly and forcefully to outpace the opponent and secure a victory.

This Orzhov Aggro deck focuses on utilizing Zoraline, Cosmos Caller and other aggressive creatures to quickly overwhelm the opponent and deal damage. The deck includes removal spells like Go for the Throat and Cut Down to clear the way for your creatures to attack. Liliana of the Veil provides additional disruption and Beza, the Bounding Spring offers evasion. The deck aims to maintain pressure and close out the game as quickly as possible, using a mix of early aggression and disruptive spells to control the board and secure victory.

The main idea behind this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive playstyle. With a focus on Rakdos creatures like Forsaken Miner, Gev, Scaled Scorch, and Iridescent Vinelasher, the deck aims to deal early damage and maintain pressure throughout the game. Supporting spells like Go for the Throat and Flamecache Gecko help control the board and eliminate threats. The deck also includes land cards like Cavern of Souls and Blackcleave Cliffs to ensure smooth mana base for casting spells efficiently. The key strategy is to rush the opponent down before they can stabilize.

This Orzhov Aggro deck focuses on quickly applying pressure to the opponent with aggressive creatures like Caustic Bronco and Preacher of the Schism. Cards like Duress and Liliana of the Veil help disrupt the opponent's game plan while removal spells like Go for the Throat and Legions to Ashes keep the board clear. The deck also utilizes cards like Aclazotz, Deepest Betrayal and Zoraline, Cosmos Caller to generate card advantage and maintain tempo. The mana base is designed to support the aggressive game plan with a mix of dual lands and Fabled Passage for color fixing.
